column1: Global Leadership and Management in Healthcare (Senior Leader Apprenticeship) MSc
column5: This MSc Global Leadership and Management in Healthcare can be studied as part of the Senior Leader Apprenticeship. To access this route you must be working in a management or leadership position and be sponsored by your organisation. As an apprentice you are employed while studying part-time for this MSc, and will need to evidence 20% off the job
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
